NONPROFIT CLOUD
Gift and Donor Trends with Rollups

Use the Fundraising Philanthropy and Partnerships app to see metrics related to donor giving and gift designations at a glance.

NOTE Using this feature requires that the person account page is set as an org-wide default.

Two components show donor and gift-related metrics. The Donor Giving Summary is in the Overview tab on the donor's business account page in the Philanthropy and Partnerships app. The Gift Designation Summary is on the Gift Designation Page in the Philanthropy and Partnerships app.

If you don't see the Donor Giving Summary or the Gift Designation Summary in the Philanthropy and Partnerships app, see Clone Templates for Fundraising Data Rollups and Lists. Learn more about the Data Processing Engine calculations in the developer documentation for DonorGiftSummary and GiftDesignation.

Donor Giving Summary Rollups

The Donor Giving Summary is on the donor's account page in the Philanthropy and Partnerships app. You can change the which data is shown in the summary by editing it in the Lightning App Builder.

The Donor Giving Summary automatically updates when it receives data from the related objects.

Recurring Gift Summary
Rolls up the following data from the Donor Gift Summary object: Total Paid Recurring Installments, Total Paid Recurring Installments Amount, First Recurring Gift Start Date, Current Recurring Gift Start Date, and Last Recurring Gift Payment Date.
Soft Credit Summary
Rolls up the following data from the Donor Gift Summary object: Soft Credit Count, Last Soft Credit Amount, Last Soft Credit Date, First Soft Credit Date, First Soft Credit Amount Highest Soft Credit Date, Highest Soft Credit Amount, Total Hard and Soft Credits, Total Hard and Soft Credit Amount.
Notable Gift Metrics
Rolls up the following data from the Donor Gift Summary object: Best Gift Year, Gift Count, First Gift Amount, First Gift Campaign, Highest Gift Amount, Highest Gift Year Amount, and Average Gift Amount.
Gift History
Rolls up the following data from the Donor Gift Summary object: First Gift Date, Second Gift Date, Last Two Years Gift Count, Gifts Two Years Ago Amount, Last Year Gift Count, Gifts Last Year Amount, Lowest Gift Amount, and Total Gifts Amount.
Gift Year Summary
Rolls up the following data from the Donor Gift Summary object: Gifts This Year Amount, Current Year Gift Count, Days Since Last Gift, Last Gift Amount, and Last Gift Date.
Gift Designation Rollups

The Gift Designation page in the Philanthropy and Partnerships app updates the gift data as you record designations. You can change which data is shown in the summary by editing it in the Lightning App Builder.

Overall Statistics
Lists the following metrics from the Gift Designation object: the First Paid Transaction Date, Last Paid Transaction Date, Total Transaction Count, Total Transaction Amount, Lowest Transaction Amount, Highest Transaction Amount, and Average Transaction Amount.
Statistics by Year
Lists the following metrics from the Gift Designation object: the Current Year Transaction Count, Current Year Transaction Amount, Last Year Transaction Count, Last Year Transaction Amount, Last Two Year Transaction Count, and Last Two Year Transaction Amount.
